item.title: About
item.author: vlas.sokolov@mpg-alumni.de (Vlas Sokolov)
item.description:
img {border-radius: 50%;} A data scientist, software developer, and an astrophysicist (not necessarily in that order) based in Munich, Germany. I enjoy tinkering with data analysis, statistical methods, and data visualization. Work Experience Data Engineer (2018 - current) INNOSPOT GmbH Doctoral Researcher (2014 - 2018) Max Planck Institute for Extraterrestrial Physics
Interests Galactic star formation in infrared dark clouds Bayesian inference, data analysis/visualisation, and machine learning Hiking, backpacking, photography Education Ph.
